attributes.action: burning chemical and hazardous waste on weldon road castleford
attributes.additional_details:
We have till 13th June to prevent this.
A company has applied to build a plant to burn chemical or hazardous waste on Wheldon road castleford.
This could be harmful to us and our children's health.
It could also affect our houses value and our communities.
The emissions are supposed to be monitored but who's to say they will, they could burn anything from hospital waste, needles, chemicals

When it states hazardous we don't want to be breathing it in. children are the future and who's to say the health of children are put at risk by the toxic air they will be breathing in.

We need the government to say NO to the permission to build this and possibly save peoples health and even lifes
